summary: A **single** is a song release with few tracks, usually one or two. It can be bought in physical or digital formats. Historically, singles were popular in the 1950s and 1960s, often played on jukeboxes. They were typically vinyl records with one song on each side. Today, digital singles are common, but physical albums are more popular. Singles can be released on various formats like vinyl, CDs, and cassettes.
title: Single (music)
